last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 5
last_episode_to_air.overview: Noel has until the end of the episode to boost the ratings from nine to 25. If he doesn't, his show will be axed and he and all his characters will be put into storage.

name: Noel Fielding's Luxury Comedy
overview: Noel Fielding fronts this psychedelic character-based comedy show half filmed and half animated, with music provided by Kasabian's Sergio Pizzorno.

seasons.name: Series 2
seasons.overview: Noel Fielding returns to E4 for the second fantastical series of Luxury Comedy: Tales from Painted Hawaii, which takes place in a coffee shop on the edge of a volcano in Hawaii.

episodes.name: Pele
episodes.overview: In this opening episode, New York Cop goes undercover in Miami, Renny & Gaviskon, the French chefs, take a trip to the moon, and Noel creates a felt-tip masterpiece with disastrous consequences.

episodes.name: The Jelly Fox
episodes.overview: In this episode Lysergic Casserole are trapped in a guitar case, Little Chrissie and Spoon Snake visit the Jelly Fox, while God ruins the party.

episodes.name: King Tutta
episodes.overview: In this episode, Dolly falls in love with a hat, Roy Circles reveals how he got over the death of his wife, and Noel uses his magic typewriter to obtain the ultimate frying pan.

episodes.name: Phone Cake
episodes.overview: In this show, Noel gets a really important call. Tony Reason speaks about his time working with Bon Jovi, while Fantasy Man tries to capture the Dream Tiger.

episodes.name: Mash Potato Utopia
episodes.overview: Noel is taunted by a Dolphin Bomber, New York Cop tells the tale of the singing fishfinger, and Secret Peter reveals where Alan Hansen has been hiding.

episodes.name: Tiger with Chlamydia
episodes.overview: Noel discovers that Andy Warhol is a forgery, Tony Reason is visited by his old mucker Tod Michaels, the music-producing hammerhead shark, and the jungle is terrorised by a giant tiger with an STD.

episodes.name: BBQ Breakdown
episodes.overview: Fantasy Man gets into a scrape with some chavs, kite-headed Bryan Ferry is decapitated by a racist protractor, and Noel accidentally sets fire to the show.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: The cast of Magnum P.I. try to sacrifice Noel to a volcano. All hopes of being rescued rest on Paul Panfer, an internet sensation who remakes Elvis films on his mobile phone.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Noel gets fantasy block (a weird strain of writer's block) and if he doesn't overcome this and write an ending to the show, Terry, his only viewer, will be killed by an asteroid

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Noel's show is turned into a reality TV programme by fantasy terrorist Reality Man. Noel is evicted back to reality and gets a job working in a greasy spoon caf√©.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Noel realises he is the only person in the show who isn't cool. He has until the end of the episode to become cool, otherwise he will be destroyed by a race of alien cucumbers.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Noel has until the end of the episode to boost the ratings from nine to 25. If he doesn't, his show will be axed and he and all his characters will be put into storage.

2.name: Series 2
2.overview: Noel Fielding returns to E4 for the second fantastical series of Luxury Comedy: Tales from Painted Hawaii, which takes place in a coffee shop on the edge of a volcano in Hawaii.
